Author: AstridItesm
Text: I've been taking a prenatal multivitamin with biotin and folic acid since a few days ago. Before that I took a hair, skin, and nails multivitamin for two months.

Author: songfireleaf
Text: Are you taking any sort of biotin supplement or anything? Not totally sure of your situation but I know that has helped a lot of people, and my hair got less angry at me after I started taking one (but I'm also still at a healthy weight for my height, so my words may only have so much mileage for this situation).
